reviewText: Look, you might think that you're ineffective in a fight unless you're armed. Truth is, you walk around armed 24/7! Sammy Franco's instruction is detailed and easy-to-remember. That's the key and it's in this DVD. If you don't own this one, you should...make it a priority.
Mr. Franco demonstrates the techniques that are the foundation of self defense. This is why CFA is so effective. SIMPLE, DIRECT, DEVASTATING!

This is the perfect DVD for anyone that would like to begin building an offensive arsenal of tools to utilize in a fight. In this DVD, Mr. Franco teaches the devastating upper body weapons of the CFA system. Mr. Franco teaches you how to deploy these weapons to protect ourselves, and also how to avoid hand injuries that are common in street fights. Anyone who is serious about learning how to fight will love this DVD.
